Module_Description: The force_sensor module contains all functions and constants to use the Force Sensor.
SubModule_Description: The force_sensor module contains all functions and constants to use the Force Sensor.

Function.Function_Description: Retrieves the measured force as decinewton. Values range from 0 to 100

Function_Arguments.Argument_Description: A port from the port submodule in the hub module

Function_Snippet.Python_Code:
from hub import port
import force_sensor


print(force_sensor.force(port.A))
